sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
By the Queene. A proclamation for waightes published by the Queenes Maiesties commaundement Proclamations. 1587-12-16 England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I) Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
3 leaves
By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, [Imprinted at London : [1587]]
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC. Sheets 1 and 2 are in 2 settings; sheet 3 is in 3 impositions. In this copy: sheet 1, line 1 of text ends "and"; sheet 2, line 1 has "waightes"; sheet 3, 4th line below crown has "LVI. pound A." and the "P" of "Printer" in the imprint is below the "L" of "London". Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
By the Queene. A proclamation for waightes published by the Queenes Maiesties commaundement Proclamations. 1587-12-16 England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I) Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
3 leaves
By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, [Imprinted at London : [1587]]
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC. Sheets 1 and 2 are in 2 settings; sheet 3 is in 3 impositions. In this copy: sheet 1, line 1 of text ends "and"; sheet 2, line 1 has "waightes"; sheet 3, 4th line below crown has "LVI. pound A." and the "P" of "Printer" in the imprint is below the "L" of "London". Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
the Queenes most excellent Maiestie
the deputies of Christopher Barker
